RuleFail, RuleGenerateWith, RuleReplaceWith
public abstract class Rule
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract base class for various kinds of deferred binding rules.

Method Detail

getFallbackEvaluationCost

public int getFallbackEvaluationCost()
Returns the cost of evaluation fallback binding values. when isApplicable() is true, this value is meaningless when isApplicable() is false, [1,Integer.MAX_VALUE-1] means a relative scale of cost, where cost c is better than cost c+k Integer.MAX_VALUE implies no match.

Returns:
cost of evaluating fallback values.
